snippet: In a poke at the White House, Edward J. Snowden asked President Vladimir V. Putin about Russia’s surveillance practices during a televised question-and-answer session.
abstract: Fugitive former National Security Agency contractor Edward J Snowden appears as special guest in a televised question-and-answer session with Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin; Snowden asks Putin about Russia's surveillance practices.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and ANDREW ROTH

lead_paragraph: In a poke at the White House, Edward J. Snowden asked President Vladimir V. Putin about Russia’s surveillance practices during a televised question-and-answer session.

headline.main: In Scripted Surprise, Putin Answers Snowden on Spying
headline.print_headline: In Scripted Surprise, Putin Answers Snowden on Spying
